RelatedSentence: Additional activities took place in all major cities across Croatia , organized by the respective institutes of public health ( 21 institutes ) .

RelatedSentence: Dr Antoinette Kaić - Rak , Head of the WHO Country Office in Croatia , participated in the main events organized in the capital city of Zagreb , including a meeting with young Scouts and the press conference .
